description: Try our easy to follow Aladdin Garlic Bread & Popcorn Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Aladdin Garlic Bread & Popcorn Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Garlic Bread: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Make cuts in rolls at 2cm intervals, being careful not to cut all the way through.
Combine butter, garlic and herbs in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Spread into cuts. Wrap each roll in foil. Bake for 15 minutes or until butter is melted. Serve.
Popcorn Chicken: Cut chicken into 3cm-thick pieces. Place into a bowl. Add soy, shaoxing cooking wine, garlic, ginger and powders, and mix well. Cover. Marinate for 10 minutes.
Dip chicken pieces into cornflour to coat, shaking off any excess. Dip into egg and coat with quinoa.
Heat oil in a wok or large, deep pan. Fry the chicken in batches for about 3 minutes or until golden brown and cooked through. Remove using a slotted spoon and drain on paper towel before serving.
